title: LoL still won't launch on mac
body: I've seen quite a few people with this same problem and it's not a network issue. When you click the "Launch" button nothing happens. All instances of league are closed out of in activity monitor and that's it. Still, need some kind of solution. :/

replies.body: You may just need to adjust a few of your administrator settings to make sure that League is allowed to run correctly. Check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq9) for how to get those permissions setup, and hit me back if that doesn't seem to help!

I am the admin on my computer and I did follow the steps but it is still closing out. Are there no direct downloads for the new client? All of the download pages just install the old one.  Thanks for the reply.

As luck would have it, we may have another route for you to take while trying to download the updated client. I don't have a direct link just yet, as the page is still being built, but if you hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they should be able to help with getting you that alternate installer!
Ah okay. I'll try that, thanks.
